long_description: A removable touchscreen that seamlessly attaches to the back of your GoPro, the GoPro LCD Touch BacPac keeps your camera small and light, but makes it easy to frame shots and play back content. LCD Touch BacPac delivers convenient touchscreen control of all camera settings. Makes it easy to frame your perfect shot, preview and play back videos and photos, including instant slow motion playback. The GoPro LCD Touch BacPac features an integrated speaker with volume control and a 3.5mm headphone jack.
short_description: A removable touchscreen that seamlessly attaches to the back of your GoPro, the GoPro LCD Touch BacPac keeps your camera small and light, but makes it easy to frame shots and play back content.
